name: Egress (itch) (Lunatic Games)
description:
You have come into possession of an infamous hard drive. Countless hackers have tried their hand at cracking the complex layers of cryptography that obscure every file; none of them have ever made it to the core. Now it’s your turn.

However, you must be vigilant. Someone is watching. Certain governments entities do not want the information stored within that drive to become public. They’re already on to you, so don’t let your device get traced. Getting this info may be your only chance to escape.

—

Join our discord here https://discord.gg/z4kbnqb to stay updated on our latest projects and provide feedback on Egress!
